name: EMELIA
description: Discover why the Emelia continues to be our most popular model. Offering 2,060 square feet of thoughtfully designed space, this 3-bed, 2-bath home features a desirable closed-concept layout that creates distinct, cozy living areas. Natural light, high ceilings, and premium craftsmanship enhance every corner, while hurricane-impact materials provide long-lasting security. From custom cabinetry to modern finishes, the Emelia delivers the perfect blend of warmth, style, and quality making it a top choice for families designing their forever home.
